snippet.title: Lucifer's Realm for the Apple II
snippet.description:
[WARNING! Might contain offensive content!]


Came also out for:

Atari ST
Commodore 64


Game description:

You were an evil human when you lived and therefore you have to go to hell, go figure. But, of course, you don't want to stay there...and you are lucky! The Nazi leader Adolf Hitler tries to get rid of Satan, so he can rule hell and it is your task to stop him!

In the game you will meet many infamous persons, like Adolph Eichmann, cult leader Jim Jones ( http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Jim_Jones ) and of course Hitler himself.

The game was made by the same team, that made "The Institute" and it shows...same graphical style, humor...just everything, but this time in a somewhat darker tone.


What I think:

Although I like "The Institute" somewhat more, this is still a fun game.
